topicSummary: Scabies is an intensely itchy skin infestation caused by the human parasite Sarcoptes scabiei. A person with scabies has an average of 10–15 mites.

latestChanges.title: Reviewed and updated
latestChanges.body: A literature search was conducted in November 2017 to identify evidence-based guidelines, UK policy, systematic reviews, and key randomized controlled trials published since the last revision of this topic. The topic has undergone restructuring. No major changes to the recommendations have been made.
